Shopper discovers cockroach in cheese bought from Whangārei Woolworths supermarket https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/shopper-discovers-cockroach-in-cheese-bought-from-whangarei-woolworths-supermarket/QFHLIC6L7RGLTE5YJEHRRJURTE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/shopper-discovers-cockroach-in-cheese-bought-from-whangarei-woolworths-supermarket/QFHLIC6L7RGLTE5YJEHRRJURTE/ Sarah CurtisWhangārei man finds cockroach in a block of Woolworth's supermarket brand cheese. Mon, 08 Apr 2024 04:20:44 +0000 Onerahi pensioner Ian Score recently bought a block of Woolworths Everyday brand cheese from the supermarket's Okara Park store. When he got it home, he discovered cockroaches in it - the one pictured here and a much smaller one elsewhere in the packaging. Photo / Michael Cunningham
